```{r}
library(GGally)
library(skimr)
library(palmerpenguins)
library(tidyverse)
```

## Basic data exploration

-   names(): get variable names

-   dim(): get data dimensions

-   head(): get first n lines (6 by default)

-   tail(): get last n lines (6 by default)

-   summary(): get basic summer statistics

```{r}
view(penguins)
names(penguins)
dim(penguins)
head(penguins)
tail(penguins)
summary(penguins)
```

```{r}
skim(penguins)
```

```{r}
ggpairs(penguins)
```
